description: Module/interface conformance fixtures for issues #53-#57, #63, #78, #81, #83, #84, #86, #88, #92, #95, #96, #98, #100, and #103.

groups.name: issue_81_async_coroutine_roundtrip
groups.feature: async coroutine ABI metadata and interface round-trip stability

groups.name: issue_83_executor_affinity_roundtrip
groups.feature: executor annotation metadata/interface preservation across modules

groups.name: issue_84_actor_isolation_roundtrip
groups.feature: actor isolation metadata and contextual keyword compatibility across modules

groups.name: issue_86_sendable_constraints_roundtrip
groups.feature: sendability metadata preservation and mismatch diagnostics across modules

groups.name: issue_88_system_attribute_roundtrip
groups.feature: Part 8 canonical spellings and borrowed/resource metadata preservation

groups.name: issue_92_borrowed_lifetime_metadata_roundtrip
groups.feature: borrowed pointer and lifetime metadata preservation across module import

groups.name: issue_96_performance_legality_roundtrip
groups.feature: direct/final/sealed legality validation across module boundaries

groups.name: issue_98_meta_derive_expansion_roundtrip
groups.feature: derive expansion preservation and deterministic re-import behavior

groups.name: issue_100_macro_derive_roundtrip_preservation
groups.feature: macro and derive expansion preservation across metadata and interfaces

groups.name: issue_103_swift_interop_roundtrip
groups.feature: Swift interop mapping metadata/interface preservation across module boundaries
